register-start.en:
I get your register request,
Send below command on group or channel you want to register on it:
/reg %{userId}
or send /cancelReg to cancel registration!

register-request-confirm.en:
Please confirm your registration with a unique name (you can't change it anymore),
To confirm it just send /confirm your-unique-name
or to cancel it just send /cancel.

help.en:
Hi âœ‹ I'm FreeNight Telegram Bot, Good to see you,
My primary job is create Post message for you, I help channel/group admin/user to create Post from existing template

/setLang fa or /setLang en - to change default language
/setSignature your-words - your words on the ends of all post

/shortLink your-url - request to generate a short url for you

Upload a photo on private chat - upload image to imgur.com and return link

/register - start registration used for fast send post

/imdb movie-name - find a movie on imdb, used to create post from imdb info

/new template-name - start ask some question to fill post fields
    -Current available templates are: [Movie, Series, MoviePoster, PostPreview]

/new template-name fromImdb - create new template based on last selected imdb movie

/sendTo key - send current post to related key channel/group

/sendTo channel-key group-key - send current post to channel and if current post support PostPreview then send a PostPreview to group
    -Current templates support PostPreview: Movie, Series
